means: 衣服袖子( sleeve的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: I had to wear long sleeves to stop myself scratching.
sentence.Network_cn: 我只好穿上长袖衣服以免自己挠痒。

sentence.Network_en: The sleeves covered his hands to the tips of his fingers.
sentence.Network_cn: 袖子遮住了他的手，一直盖到指尖。

sentence.Network_en: Choose short or three-quarter sleeves for summer.
sentence.Network_cn: 夏天穿短袖或七分袖的衣服。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The product features shrink sleeves and caps with built - in tamper - evidence tabs ., 该产品具有收缩袖口和帽子带有内置篡改证据的标签.

shiny black coat has a gold zipper running from the high collar all the way to the bottom . the sleeves have gold zippers running down them as well .闪亮的黑色上衣有着金色的拉链，拉链从高领一到底端，加上袖子的金色拉链，让偌大的上衣浑然一体，收紧自如。

by constantly adjusting collar angulations , you can adjust deformable sleeves reduction was due to the change from tape operating conditions resulting from tape deformation .通过不断地调节轴环倾斜度，可以调整可变形套筒的变形程度，从而补偿了由于改变纸带运行条件而造成的纸带变形。

entry.def: The sleeves of a coat, shirt, or other item of clothing are the parts that cover your arms.

example.ex: His sleeves were rolled up to his elbows...
He wore a black band on the left sleeve of his jacket.
example.tran: 他在夹克衫的左袖上戴了一条黑箍儿。

entry.def: A record sleeve is the stiff envelope in which a record is kept.

example.ex: There are to be no pictures of him on the sleeve of the new record.
example.tran: 新唱片的封套上不会出现他的照片。

entry.tran: 流露自己的感情;把喜怒挂在脸上
entry.def: If someone wears their heart on their sleeve, they behave in a way that makes their feelings very obvious, for example when they are in love with someone.

entry.tran: 藏有…想法;留有锦囊妙计;心中另有…高招
entry.def: If you have something up your sleeve, you have an idea or plan which you have not told anyone about. You can also say that someone has an ace, card, or trick up their sleeve .

example.ex: He wondered what Shearson had up his sleeve...
example.tran: 他暗自猜度希尔森究竟有什么高招。

example.ex: I'd been doing some quiet investigating in the meantime and had an ace up my sleeve.
example.tran: 与此同时，我不动声色地展开了调查，掌握了一张王牌。

auth_sentence.content: Mr Mak smiles as he rolls back his sleeves.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr Mak smiles as he rolls back his sleeves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr Mak smiles as he rolls back his sleeves.

auth_sentence.content: He tucked up his sleeves and squared his elbows.
auth_sentence.res_content: He tucked up his sleeves and squared his elbows.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He tucked up his sleeves and squared his elbows.
